plugin.name: NLLGrid
plugin.description: SeisComP Travel-times wrapper for NonLinLoc grid files

struct.description: Parameters defining the settings for this profile. Once defined, the profile can be registered in ttt.NLLGrid.tables

parameter.name: P-Phases
parameter.description: Defines a list of accepted phases for the P grid files.

parameter.name: S-Phases
parameter.description: Defines a list of accepted phases for the S grid files.

parameter.name: maxSearchDistance
parameter.description: Define the maximum allowed station location difference between the inventory and the grid files. If a grid file for a station location closer than this value cannot be found, no travel time table can be provided for a station.

parameter.name: swapBytes
parameter.description: Enable for grid files generated with different endianness.

parameter.name: maxOpenFiles
parameter.description: Allowing a high number of grid files to be kept open may help the performance when working with a high number of stations. Pay attention to your system limits (max open files or max memory mapping limits depending on useMemoryMapping option).

parameter.name: useMemoryMapping
parameter.description: Use mmap to read grid files. This offers better performance, but it is optional as certain file systems might not work nicely with it.
